languages.text: "Если ты хотел меня разозлить — у тебя вышло. В варп твою историю и больше не смей так мне отвечать".
"If your goal was to anger me, you have succeeded. To the warp with your story. Do not reply to me in such a fashion ever again."
languages.original_text: "Если ты хотел меня разозлить — у тебя вышло. В варп твою историю и больше не смей так мне отвечать".

traits.locale_text: "If your goal was to anger me, you have succeeded. To the warp with your story. Do not reply to me in such a fashion ever again."
"If your goal was to anger me, you have succeeded. To the warp with your story. Do not reply to me in such a fashion ever again."
"If your goal was to anger me, you have succeeded. To the warp with your story. Do not reply to me in such a fashion ever again."
"If your goal was to anger me, you have succeeded. To the warp with your story. Do not reply to me in such a fashion ever again."
"If your goal was to anger me, you have succeeded. To the warp with your story. Do not reply to me in such a fashion ever again."
"If your goal was to anger me, you have succeeded. To the warp with your story. Do not reply to me in such a fashion ever again."

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}を怒らせるのが目的だったのなら、見事に成功したな。君の話など〈歪み〉にでも投げ込んでしまえ。二度とそんな口のきき方をするな」
languages.original_text: "If your goal was to anger me, you have succeeded. To the warp with your story. Do not reply to me in such a fashion ever again."

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}を怒らせるのが目的だったのなら、見事に成功したな。君の話など〈歪み〉にでも投げ込んでしまえ。二度とそんな口のきき方をするな」

languages.text: "Falls Ihr mich verärgern wolltet, so ist Euch das gelungen. Zur Leere mit Eurer Geschichte. Gebt mir nie wieder so eine Antwort."
languages.original_text: "If your goal was to anger me, you have succeeded. To the warp with your story. Do not reply to me in such a fashion ever again."

traits.locale_text: "Falls Ihr mich verärgern wolltet, so ist Euch das gelungen. Zur Leere mit Eurer Geschichte. Gebt mir nie wieder so eine Antwort."

languages.text: « Si votre objectif était de me fâcher, vous avez réussi. Que le vide vous emporte, vous et votre histoire. Ne vous avisez plus jamais de me répondre sur ce ton. »
languages.original_text: "If your goal was to anger me, you have succeeded. To the warp with your story. Do not reply to me in such a fashion ever again."

traits.locale_text: « Si votre objectif était de me fâcher, vous avez réussi. Que le vide vous emporte, vous et votre histoire. Ne vous avisez plus jamais de me répondre sur ce ton. »

languages.text: «Si su objetivo era enfurecerme, lo ha conseguido. A la disformidad con su historia. No vuelva a contestarme de ese modo nunca jamás».
languages.original_text: "If your goal was to anger me, you have succeeded. To the warp with your story. Do not reply to me in such a fashion ever again."

traits.locale_text: «Si su objetivo era enfurecerme, lo ha conseguido. A la disformidad con su historia. No vuelva a contestarme de ese modo nunca jamás».

languages.text: “如果你的目的是惹我发火，那你已经成功了。你的故事可以滚到亚空间去了，以后不准再用这种语气回答我。”
languages.original_text: "If your goal was to anger me, you have succeeded. To the warp with your story. Do not reply to me in such a fashion ever again."

traits.locale_text: “如果你的目的是惹我发火，那你已经成功了。你的故事可以滚到亚空间去了，以后不准再用这种语气回答我。”

languages.text: "Galiba beni sinirlendirmeye çalışıyorsun. Başardın, aferin. Hikâyeni de al, başına çal. Bana bir daha böyle cevap vermeyeceksin."
languages.original_text: "If your goal was to anger me, you have succeeded. To the warp with your story. Do not reply to me in such a fashion ever again."

traits.locale_text: "Galiba beni sinirlendirmeye çalışıyorsun. Başardın, aferin. Hikâyeni de al, başına çal. Bana bir daha böyle cevap vermeyeceksin."
